detail_desc: Top in soft cotton jersey with reversible sequins, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck blouse in jacquard-weave viscose with a sheen. Gathered, elasticated seam down the front, darts at the back and long puff sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft, fine knit with short sleeves and elasticated smocking at the top. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Round sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Top in stretch viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Deep V-neck with a gathered seam down the front for a draped effect and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Rugby shirt in soft jersey with a contrasting colour collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Chunky-soled sandals with adjustable fabric straps and hook and loop fastenings. Imitation leather insoles. Height of soles 7 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with covered heels, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Backless jersey top with small round studs and ties at the neck and hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft, brushed jersey with a gentle V-neck and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Knee-length skirt in a sturdy, textured knit. High waist with covered elastication.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a soft organic cotton textured knit with buttons down the front.
Jumper in a marled, rib-knit linen and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless tulle dress with a double-layered lace bodice, narrow satin shoulder straps that cross at the back and pearly buttons at the back. Skirt with two layers of tulle to create width. Lined.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey with smocking at the top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Scarf in a patterned weave with fringes.
Straight-style top in soft jersey overlayered with lace. Round neckline with a discreet zip at the back.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the sole. Cotton twill linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Straight T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in sturdy, patterned jersey with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Double-layered waistband and a slit at the back of the hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
Silicone bracelet with a print motif and a glittery unicorn decoration. Width 2.5 cm. Length 21 cm.
Shorts in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
Pleated skirt woven in a sturdy viscose blend with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 2-10Y) and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Trousers in a pleated weave with a high, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Calf-length dress in a double-layered cotton weave with a crinkled texture. Round neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and gathered seams at the hips and knees for added volume.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.

Knee-length trenchcoat in a woven modal blend with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and decorative button at the cuffs. Front pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jersey dress with a V-neck and draping at the top, short dolman sleeves and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit gloves.
Short-sleeved jersey top.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a high waist with concealed elastication, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.

Shopper in imitation leather with details in real suede. Two handles at the top and concealed ties inside the short sides. One spacious, zipped outer compartment and a small inner compartment. Studs on the base. Unlined. Size 9.5x31x33.5 cm.
Double-breasted jacket woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, buttons down the front, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar that has a gathered seam at the front. Opening at the back and ties at the back of the neck.
5-pocket joggers in stretch twill with a ribbed elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sleeveless dresses in patterned organic cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a contrasting colour section at the front. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Calf-length, sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck, tie detail at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini. Top with a frill and narrow shoulder straps, one with a sewn-on metal decoration. Fully lined bottoms.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a small loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed finish.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Dogtooth-patterned scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 25x160 cm.

Jumper in a soft fine knit with a unique nursing feature, round neck, long sleeves and ties at the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Gym set. Metal padlock with a combination lock. Towel in fast-drying microfibre with a practical eyelet. Elasticated latex bands for resistance training, stretching or rehabilitation. The bands have different levels of resistance depending on their colour. Light green has light resistance (6.6 kg 100% stretched, 14.97 kg 200% stretched), grey has medium resistance (6.24 kg 100% stretched, 18.28 kg 200% stretched) and black has heavy resistance (6.62 kg 100% stretched, 19.05 kg 200% stretched). Size 5x60 cm. Size of towel 30x60 cm.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Printed poncho top with butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Ballet pumps with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Beret in a soft, fine knit.

Ankle-length suit trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a sewn-on tie belt, and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Calf-length kaftan in a softly draping weave with a sheen. V-neck, short sleeves and a pleat at the back for added volume.
Shorts in an airy weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, wrapover legs and lace trims.

Soft, non-wired nursing bra in organic cotton jersey with lace details and lightly padded opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps, and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted top in a rib knit with a collar, V-neck, long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Top in soft terry with a print motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Slightly longer jacket in woven fabric with a tie belt at the waist, jetted pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Dress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
